messages.content: Thank you for sharing that it takes 30 to 60 minutes for something. Can you provide more context or details about what specifically this time frame refers to? Understanding the task or activity involved can help us delve deeper into your experience and potential areas for improvement or optimization.

is the context I gave you are started created interview in the interview is not working so I put in the session ID and started to that 30 to 60 minutes with an estimate of how long that interview was going to take and I was going to try to get you to read the first question

Thank you for providing additional context about your experience with the interview process. It seems like there was an issue with the interview not working as expected, prompting you to input a session ID and estimate that the interview would take 30 to 60 minutes. 

In light of this, I would like to delve deeper into the challenges you faced during the interview setup process. Could you elaborate on any specific difficulties you encountered while trying to initiate the interview or input the session ID? Understanding these pain points can help identify potential areas for improvement in the user experience. 

Additionally, if there were any other aspects of the interview process that stood out to you, feel free to share them as well. Your insights are valuable in shaping a more seamless and efficient experience for all users.
and capture my response on the remote interview page for remote users but they didn't work

Thank you for sharing that the remote interview page did not capture your response as intended for remote users. This can be frustrating when technology does not function as expected during crucial interactions like interviews.

To further understand your experience, could you elaborate on what specifically didn't work on the remote interview page? Was it a technical issue preventing your responses from being captured, or was there a usability challenge that made it difficult to navigate or input your answers effectively?

By gathering more details about the specific issues you encountered, we can better pinpoint areas that may require improvement in the remote interview process to ensure a smoother and more successful experience for all users. Your insights are valuable in helping us enhance the remote interview platform for future users.

Participant: are you listening

Interviewer: Thank you for your message. It's important for us to ensure that we are actively listening and engaging with your feedback to address any concerns or issues you may have encountered. Can you please share more details about your current experience or any specific areas you would like to discuss further? Your insights are valuable in helping us improve our services and user experiences.

Participant: Thank you for sharing.

As the Journey Expert, I would like to delve deeper into your overall experience with the interview process. Can you elaborate on any positive aspects of the interview setup or platform that you found particularly effective or user-friendly? Understanding what worked well can also provide valuable insights for enhancing the overall user experience. Additionally, if there are any specific suggestions or improvements you would like to see implemented in the interview process, please feel free to share them. Your feedback is crucial in shaping a more seamless and efficient experience for all users.

Participant, I appreciate your acknowledgment of the message. Moving forward, I would like to delve deeper into your experiences with remote interviews. Could you share any specific features or functionalities that you believe would enhance the remote interview process and make it more user-friendly for participants like yourself? Your insights can help us tailor the platform to better meet the needs and expectations of users.
what's going on here I don't even see it

Participant, it seems like you're feeling a bit confused or uncertain about the current conversation. I want to ensure that we address any concerns or questions you may have. Could you provide more details on what you are not seeing or understanding? Your feedback is important in helping us improve communication and clarity in our interactions. Feel free to share any thoughts or observations you have regarding the interview process or any other topics you'd like to discuss.
